price: 45 Ils ne purent ni se lever pour s’échapper, ni être sauvés.
arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مِن قِيَامٖ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنتَصِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: famā is'taṭāʿū min qiyāmin wamā kānū muntaṣirīna
